name: More Sci Fi Classics Quiz / Test | Movie Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Here Comes Mr. Jordan' was about a man who reached Heaven somewhat prematurely. Who was the star?
'Mr Jordan' was re-made as 'Heaven Can Wait'. Which actor was NOT in the re-make?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Swayze.

	Warren Beatty, Dyan Cannon and Julie Christie, too. Swayze was in 'Ghost'

questions.text: 'Journey To The Center of the Earth' was an easygoing fantasy. It featured what unlikely co-star?
Before it was a Broadway musical, 'Phantom of the Opera' was a 1943 movie. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Claude Rains.

	A weird story in any format

questions.text: This actor departed from his usual cowboy roles to star in a reincarnation tale called 'I've Lived Before'.
'House on Haunted Hill' was recently re-made. Who starred in the original?
'Dead Again' was also a reincarnation story. Who was the star?
Raymond Burr had an early career role in this monster movie.
questions.explanation:
Godzilla.

	Maybe the monster needed a good lawyer after causing all that destruction?

questions.text: One more tale of reincarnation: 'The Reincarnation of Peter Proud'. It starred Michael Sarrazin; who was the female lead?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer O'Neill.

	Rather interesting - but I didn't like the ending. Adams was in 'Creature From The Black Lagoon'.

questions.text: 'The Fly' was a classic. Who was one of the stars?
questions.explanation:
David Hedison.

	A sequel and a re-make.
